scripts.compile:contracts: npx truffle compile && npx typechain --target=truffle-v5 'build/contracts/*.json' && npx typechain --target=web3-v1  'build/contracts/*.json'
scripts.build: npm run compile:contracts && npm run compile:ts
scripts.migrate: npm run compile:contracts && npx tsc -b ./tsconfig.migrate.json && npx truffle migrate --reset
scripts.testone: npm run compile:ts && npx truffle test --bail
